hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
# Delete the previous repo clone directories rm -rf li origin-dev-tools openshift-java-client
# Clone the repos git clone git@github.com:openshift/li.git git clone git@github.com:openshift/origin-dev-tools.git git clone git@github.com:openshift/openshift-java-client.git
if [ -n "$JAVA_CLIENT_PULL_ID" ] then set +x echo "
*****Locally Merging Pull Request: https://github.com/openshift/openshift-java-client/pull/$JAVA_CLIENT_PULL_ID" set -x test_pull_requests --local_merge_pull_request $JAVA_CLIENT_PULL_ID --repo openshift-java-client --config ~/.test_pull_requests_java_client.json fi
set +x echo "
" set -x
# Build and install HEAD for the tests pushd li build/devenv launch devenv_jboss_tools_${BUILD_NUMBER} --verifier instance_hostname=`build/devenv print_hostname devenv_jboss_tools_${BUILD_NUMBER}` popd
# Run the tests pushd openshift-java-client set +e mvn clean package -Pintegration-tests -Dlibra_server=$instance_hostname -Ddefault_rhlogin=toolsjboss@gmail.com -Drhpassword=1q2w3e -Dsun.net.client.defaultConnectTimeout=600000 -Dsun.net.client.defaultReadTimeout=600000 -Djsse.enableSNIExtension=false RESULT=$? set -e popd
# terminate pushd li build/devenv terminate devenv_jboss_tools_${BUILD_NUMBER} --download_artifacts popd
if [ $RESULT -ne 0 ] then exit $RESULT fi
# Make sure all the pull requests will merge cleanly if [ -n "$JAVA_CLIENT_PULL_ID" ] then test_pull_requests --test_merge_pull_request $JAVA_CLIENT_PULL_ID --repo openshift-java-client --config ~/.test_pull_requests_java_client.json fi
# Do the merge if [ -n "$JAVA_CLIENT_PULL_ID" ] then test_pull_requests --merge_pull_request $JAVA_CLIENT_PULL_ID --repo openshift-java-client --config ~/.test_pull_requests_java_client.json fi
